item.content:encoded:
Reblogged this on RogersLongHairBlog and commented:

I could easily re-write this and caste it with Ruiz, Joshua, Trump, Bilderberg, Anonymous elites and people believing their own BS.
Instead a Picture.
https://i0.wp.com/nytimespost.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/AnthoNy-Joshua-KNOCKED-OUT-by-Andy-Ruiz-Jr-in-one.jpg?resize=696%2C413&ssl=1
And Another Older Blog.
https://longhairedmusings.wordpress.com/2012/07/06/socratic-management-learning-by-remembering/
